ch.ethz.vizzly
Class VizzlyStateContainer

java.lang.Object
  ch.ethz.vizzly.VizzlyStateContainer

public class VizzlyStateContainer
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains all state that is needed to run the application. For example, the memory cache is initialized here.

Author:
Matthias Keller
